headline: Amazon, AppLovin Bid To Buy TikTok Ahead of Deadline, Reports Say
summary: Amazon and AppLovin reportedly submitted bids to acquire TikTok, ahead of a U.S. ban set to go into effect Saturday if no deal is reached with the app's Chinese parent company.

raw.headline: Amazon, AppLovin Bid To Buy TikTok Ahead of Deadline, Reports Say
raw.summary: Amazon and AppLovin reportedly submitted bids to acquire TikTok, ahead of a U.S. ban set to go into effect Saturday if no deal is reached with the app's Chinese parent company.

headline: AppLovin (NasdaqGS:APP) Sees 13% Dip Over Quarter Amid Class Action Lawsuit
summary: AppLovin (NasdaqGS:APP) has experienced a 13% decline in its stock price over the last quarter, significantly impacting shareholder returns. This price movement coincides with substantial legal challenges, including a class action lawsuit for alleged securities violations and claims of ad fraud, possibly eroding investor confidence. Meanwhile, the broader market displayed volatility with key indexes like the Nasdaq Composite rising nearly 1% despite trade uncertainty stemming from pending...
